page.title: 08Armed Forces
page.content: Many people in and around the town work for the Ministry of Defence in Bath where Naval Headquarters are situated. A huge proportion of our national income is spent on, "Defence," and a large beaurocratic administrative force is required to run our defence establishments. Many of these minor officials live in Bradford-on-Avon, as do many retired military officers. The underground web of worked out quarries in the area also provide excellent safety bunkers which may offer short term protection for personel, equipment and records in the event of nuclear war. Many people live in fear of nuclear attack. Bradford-on-Avon is a centre of Quaker following and peace movements.
